name: Head in the Clouds
description:
Here's my game for the 70th mini Jam! There's not much story wise or anything, you play as a ship with angel wings, flying through the heavens, and fighting off the demons who are waiting for you.

The game is an on the rails shooter, and it works for both controller and mouse input:

Controls (controller (specifically X-box controller)):

  • Left Stick to move character;
  • Right Stick to move Cursor;
  • Left/Right Triggers to switch between weapons
  • A to shoot;
  • Y to speed up;
  • X to slow down;
  • B to reload;

Controls (mouse and keyboard):

  • WASD to move player;
  • Mouse to Aim cursor;
  • Mouse Scroll wheel to switch between weapons;
  • Left Click to shoot;
  • Space bar to speed up'
  • Left Shift to slow down;
  • Right Click to reload;
  • (also, this is only on keyboard, but G stops movement and H restarts it)

Other than that, I hope you enjoy the game, It's a little buggy, but I think it turned out okay, and I hope you all enjoy it!
